meanings.sent1: The shiny new toy was very sellable at the store.
meanings.sent2: The fresh produce was highly sellable at the market.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot was so sellable that it convinced everyone to buy it.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter made her personality sellable to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The delicious aroma of the bakery made the pastries incredibly sellable.

meanings.sent1: The old books were still sellable despite their age.
meanings.sent2: The antique furniture was very sellable due to its unique design.
meanings.sent3: The broken clock was surprisingly sellable as a quirky art piece.
meanings.sent4: His idea was so sellable that it was quickly picked up by investors.
meanings.sent5: The rare gemstone was incredibly sellable to collectors around the world.
